txt.en: Ordgar is dead, and his killer lies mortally wounded near him.\n\nDunward warned Hildith of the danger in riding out alone, and the warning was just. Ordgar is the most recent of many deaths upon the plains of the Westfold of late.
Ordgar was clearly cut down while fighting an Orc he encountered, but the Orc appears to be mortally wounded.
You have avenged Ordgar, whose death was needless. Fewer Orcs now haunt the Westfold.
'My boys'll be wanting to avenge my death, [placeholder]. You make yourself comfortable, and let them stake you in the guts while we make friendly banter.\n\n'They'll be along soon, for revenge...'
Speak with the Orc wounded by Ordgar
You have avenged Ordgar, whose death was needless. Fewer Orcs now haunt the Westfold.
The Orc that slew Ordgar lies next to him, north of Grimslade in the Westfold.\n\nYou should speak with the dying Orc.
Speak with the Orc wounded by Ordlac
You have defeated the remainder of the attacking Orcs
